title: Best of The Herd: 08/19/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/19/2019
description:
Colin explains how the Oakland Raiders are like a poorly run restaurant. Colin talks about why Jerry Jones is officially all in on Dak Prescott. Colin thinks Jimmy Garoppolo was the perfect bargain for the San Francisco 49ers. And Colin tells you where he was right and where he was wrong this past week. Plus, Antonio Brown’s agent Drew Rosenhaus joins the show to discuss the latest happening with his client.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
